items.summary: Update the main question headline in frontend/src/App.tsx to include the name "Navera" and add a clear, romantic highlight effect around the word "Navera" (e.g., soft glow + subtle underline/marker effect) while preserving the existing responsive layout and overall Valentine styling.

Replace the image used in the "Yes" (Good Choice) modal with a new static image that feels romantic and caring, and update frontend/src/App.tsx to reference the new asset under /assets/generated/ while keeping the existing modal sizing (object-contain), rounded corners, and shadow styling.
